code: import api,{openApi}from"../../services/api";const usePlans=()=>{const getPlanList=async params=>{const{data}=await openApi.request({url:'/plans/list',method:'GET',params});return data;};const list=async params=>{const{data}=await api.request({url:'/plans/all',method:'GET',params});return data;};const save=async data=>{const{data:responseData}=await api.request({url:'/plans',method:'POST',data});return responseData;};const update=async data=>{const{data:responseData}=await api.request({url:"/plans/".concat(data.id),method:'PUT',data});return responseData;};const remove=async id=>{const{data}=await api.request({url:"/plans/".concat(id),method:'DELETE'});return data;};const getPlanCompany=async(params,id)=>{const{data}=await api.request({url:"/companies/listPlan/".concat(id),method:'GET',params});return data;};return{getPlanList,list,save,update,remove,getPlanCompany};};export default usePlans;
